label: 節用集
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: A...substantial dictionary...originally compile about 1444.  It was frequently revised and expanded, and some eight hundred editions were printed between the late sixteenth century and the early Meiji period.  A 1680 edition, Setsuyō taizen, had thirty thousand words (p. 721). [節用大全]
